channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Lots of leaves blocking drain, 5th December
item.description:
We are in a very wet area and this drain is situated next to chaffinch brook. We have lots of flooding here, please can the mount of leaves be cleared thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chaffinch Road, New Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Yet another failure to empty this litter bin, 5th December
item.description:
You will see that I reported a failure to empty it in the middle of last month - ref 8431809. Yet again there is a similar problem. See the attached photos, one taken on Wednesday 3 December and the other today 5 December. Why is the bin not emptied routinely ?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 39, Stone Park Avenue, Eden Park, Greater London
